intro_text: The patrol hears some odd noises coming from an abandoned Twoleg nest out in the swamp.
decline_text: The patrol decides not to investigate.

success_outcomes.text: It's just an odd loner singing to {PRONOUN/n_c:0/self}. The patrol greets {PRONOUN/n_c:0/object}, and as the loner isn't inside c_n territory, it's a polite interaction without any hostility.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat had a brief chat when they encountered each other near an abandoned Twoleg nest.

success_outcomes.text: It's just an odd loner singing to {PRONOUN/n_c:0/self}. When {PRONOUN/n_c:0/subject} {VERB/n_c:0/see/sees} p_l, {PRONOUN/n_c:0/subject} {VERB/n_c:0/invite/invites} {PRONOUN/p_l/object} to sing along. Instead, p_l offers the strange, battered-looking cat an introduction to c_n. It's got to be far less lonely than {PRONOUN/n_c:0/poss} current life.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues. It's only by the grace of StarClan that s_c is there, fighting with the courage of LionClan, the strength of TigerClan, and the dexterity of LeopardClan. Shaken but no more than bruised, the patrol manages to retreat to safety.

log.cats_from: to_cat and a group of rogues ambushed from_cat's patrol.
to_cat saved from_cat's life when their patrol was attacked by rogues.

success_outcomes.text: s_c signals for the patrol to stop. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/explain/explains} {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} concerns about the unknown situation in a murmur. Maybe {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} being too cautious - but then p_l picks up on the scent of strange cats around the Twoleg den. Forewarned, the patrol retreats to safety.

log.cats_from: to_cat's cautious nature saved from_cat and the patrol from being ambushed by rogues.

intro_text: There are dark clouds on the horizon, and p_l wonders if they should continue.
decline_text: The patrol decides to head back early.

success_outcomes.text: While it's pretty gray up there, the promised rain never comes.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat persevered despite the overcast day and had a successful border patrol.

success_outcomes.text: The cats get wet in the rain, but the patrol is otherwise successful.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat persevered despite the rainy day and had a successful border patrol.

success_outcomes.text: s_c makes a careful judgment, and the patrol keeps going. They stick to solid ground, sometimes routing themselves through the trees as the rain begins to pour around them.

log.cats_from: from_cat approved of to_cat's choice to stick to high ground on a border patrol on a rainy day.

success_outcomes.text: It's not worth the risk - s_c convinces the patrol to head for home.

log.cats_from: from_cat appreciated that to_cat spoke up and suggested the patrol go home early on an overcast day.

fail_outcomes.text: There is a downpour, and a sudden flood from the overflowing river in the swamp sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away. Some manage to ride the waves, paddling for their lives, but many are lost forever.

success_outcomes.text: r_c leaps forward, dashing to the other side of the bog and up into the trees. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/make/makes} it in time to watch the swamp get lost under a tide of water from inland.

s_c scrambles back the way {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} came and watches the swamp disappear under a flood of water. It leaves behind a changed landscape, tons of debris - and a large dead sheep. s_c pounces on the opportunity to scavenge.

success_outcomes.text: s_c shrieks at the strange sound, paws digging into the mud as {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/turn/turns} and {VERB/s_c/run/runs} for home. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/are/is} proven right when the swamp disappears under a flood of water from inland. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} caution saved {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} life.

intro_text: On their way to mark the far corners of their swamps, r_c starts telling a story of their ancestors to keep every cat entertained.
decline_text: The patrol seems uninterested, so r_c drops the idea.

success_outcomes.text: It keeps the cats' minds off their damp paws and the muddy path. The patrol goes quickly and easily.

log.cats_from: from_cat appreciated to_cat telling a story on a border patrol to keep everyone's minds off their damp paws.

success_outcomes.text: s_c spins a vivid, engaging tale of a massive war their ancestors fought over the border the patrol is headed to mark. Not only does it keep every cat entertained, but it also emphasizes the importance of the patrol and motivates everyone.

log.cats_from: During a border patrol, from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story about an ancient war.

success_outcomes.text: It's a fantastic idea, making the patrol fly by as cats chat and laugh with their Clanmates, and everyone ends the day feeling much closer to each other.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed the story that to_cat told during a long border patrol.
from_cat and to_cat chatted and grew closer on a border patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: r_c skids on mud as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} getting to an exciting part and has to stop the story to pay attention to the path.

log.cats_from: s_c told r_c to stop telling a story and focus on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} duties during a border patrol.

intro_text: The patrol catches the scent of a fox - but is it red or gray?
decline_text: The patrol decides not to pursue the fox.

success_outcomes.text: The red vixen smells of milk, and hopefully by driving her out of the territory, her litter won't be a threat to the Clan. If they don't starve, c_n will hunt them down - they do not share territory with foxes.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive a vixen out of their territory.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove a vixen out of their territory.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol drives away the red fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. It's brutal, but these fluffy baby foxes would one day have grown to be kit-killers and thieves.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: s_c displays incredible skill, driving the mother vixen out of the territory almost by {PRONOUN/s_c/self}. Now neither the red fox nor her cubs pose a threat to the Clan. It truly proves s_c's place as one of c_n's most talented and skillful fighters.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol overcomes the red vixen and drives her off thanks to a brilliant battle move by s_c at a critical moment. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} bravery ensures the patrol's success, and the cats arrive back at camp singing {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} praises to make sure the Clan knows it.

log.cats_from: to_cat's bravery in a fight against a vixen greatly impressed from_cat.

success_outcomes.text: Led by p_l, and with a heap of cooperation and teamwork, the patrol drives away the red fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. The swamps will be safe from both the threat the vixen posed this season, and the threat her cubs would've posed to c_n in the seasons to come.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: With so many cats working together in tight coordination, they manage to accomplish the near-impossible, killing the red mother vixen and ending the threat to the Clan that she and her cubs pose.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to kill a vixen and her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol killed a vixen and her cubs.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox is vicious and determined, and the small patrol is beaten back. But these swampy woodlands are c_n's and they haven't given up. They may have lost this battle, but c_n will win this war.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat were unable to drive off a vixen together.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox is vicious and determined. Although they lose this battle, through teamwork the cats manage to retreat without injury.

s_c is determined to win, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence is misplaced. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} a good fighter, but not a great one, and in a moment that embarrasses {PRONOUN/s_c/object} deeply the rest of the patrol have to rescue {PRONOUN/s_c/object}from the red vixen.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.

fail_outcomes.text: Never threaten a mother's young - the red vixen kills r_c in the skirmish.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.

intro_text: The patrol catches the scent of a fox - but is it red or gray?
decline_text: The patrol decides not to pursue the fox.

success_outcomes.text: The stocky gray vixen they track down smells of milk, and though she's nearly double the weight of any of the patrol and all of it muscle, they meet her eyes squarely, and leap to attack. c_n does not tolerate sharing their territory with foxes, and they work together to drive her off.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive a vixen out of their territory.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove a vixen out of their territory.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol drives away the gray fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. It's brutal, but these fluffy baby foxes would one day have grown to be kit-killers and thieves. Better to deal with them now than when they're the height and nearly double the weight of a cat, though a gray fox will always be easier than a big red one.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: s_c displays incredible skill, driving the mother vixen out of the territory almost by {PRONOUN/s_c/self}. Now neither the gray fox nor her cubs pose a threat to the Clan. It places s_c as one of c_n's most talented and skillful fighters - a gray fox is a dangerous competitor.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about to_cat's bravery in battle against a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol finds a stocky gray vixen wandering their wetland, and drives her out in a scene that mostly involves yowling and screaming and yapping at each other until she gives in. r_c gets a little battered, but everyone is mostly fine.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a gray vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol overcomes the gray vixen they found and drives her off thanks to a brilliant battle move by s_c. The cats swirl around s_c afterwards, congratulating {PRONOUN/s_c/object} on {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} bravery and skill.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: With so many cats working together in tight coordination, they're able to keep the gray vixen they found pinned and distracted as they wear her down. The fox eventually flees for her den, and the patrol follows to take care of the cubs she's raising.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive out a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: Bravely, s_c charges the gray fox, yowling threats. The vixen spooks and skitters up a tree, growling and barking in a squeaky tone, and s_c follows her up into the branches. As the rest of the patrol backs {PRONOUN/s_c/object} up from the ground, s_c screams until the fox is cowering and afraid, then lets her flee.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed by how to_cat chased a gray vixen up into a tree.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol comes across a gray vixen at the end of the scent trail. She spots them too, measures herself up against them, then flees, scrambling up a tree and into the swamp canopy in a move that completely surprises the cats. This round goes to the gray fox.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat were unable to drive a gray vixen off their territory together.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c is determined to win, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence is misplaced. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} a good fighter, but not a great one, and in a moment that embarrasses {PRONOUN/s_c/object} deeply the gray vixen slips past {PRONOUN/s_c/object} and flees into the maze of the many wooded semi-submerged islands of the swamp.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c is determined to win, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence is misplaced. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} a good fighter, but not a great one, and the stocky gray vixen is all muscle, barging past s_c and knocking {PRONOUN/s_c/object} rump over paws as she flees from the patrol.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a gray vixen.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.
